Package graphics.renderer

Class DebugRenderBatch

java.lang.Object
graphics.renderer.RenderBatch
graphics.renderer.DebugRenderBatch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Comparable<RenderBatch>
public class DebugRenderBatch extends RenderBatch

Azurite

Used to render debug materials, like collision hitboxes, raycasts, or test data in general. Only supports rendering lines.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • DebugRenderBatch

      public DebugRenderBatch(int maxBatchSize, int zIndex)
      Parameters:
      maxBatchSize - the maximum number of primitives in a batch
      zIndex - the zIndex of the batch. Used to sort the batches in order of which sprites appear above others.
